thread.section_title: Giant Vintage Sunglasses Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Giant Vintage Sunglasses | www.giantvintage.com
thread.title: haile p
thread.title_full: Giant Vintage Sunglasses reviewed by haile p

author: haile p
title: haile p
text: They updated me on my delivery, so I wasn't just waiting without knowing when they would arrive. The sunglasses are cute and they always have a fun selection! They look like they could break easily if they got a little squished, but that's pretty similar to most glasses.
